game.name: Specular Jiangshi
game.shortDescription: Specular Jiangshi is an action-adventure game set in a mirrored labyrinth. Players explore an eerie maze, battling terrifying Jiangshi (Chinese hopping undead) that lurk within, while searching for the exit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Specular Jiangshi is an action-adventure game set in a mirrored labyrinth. Players explore an eerie maze, battling terrifying Jiangshi (Chinese hopping undead) that lurk within, while searching for the exit.
